animeTitle: Take That! I, the Villain, Plunder All the Worlds
otherNames: Na Lai Ba Ni! Fanpai De Wo Lveduo Zhu Tian Wan Jie, Ná Lái Ba Nǐ! Fǎnpài De Wǒ Lüèduó Zhū Tiān Wàn Jiè, Take That! I, the Villain, Plunder All the Worlds, 拿来吧你！反派的我掠夺诸天万界
synopsis: Lin Feng has carried the stigma of being a traitor's son since he was young, enduring endless bullying and insults. After binding with the 'Transcendence Plundering System,' he rises powerfully. Even if everyone thinks I'm a bad person, so what? I'll walk my own path, traversing the worlds, plundering cheats, slapping villains in the face, leveling up, and turning the tables. I will make sure that no one dares to look down on me again! I will clear my parents' names!
